https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oBG1z2DLEvEAWDaSaXIi7dmC4Lf.jpg Bellator 287: Piccolotti vs. Barnaoui (also known as Bellator Milan) is a mixed martial arts event produced by Bellator MMA, that took place on October 29, 2022, at the Allianz Cloud Arena in Milan, Italy. Bellator 287: Piccolotti vs. Barnaoui
